location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Duplicate letter no.1556 of 1854 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of Kemball’s previous letter (folio 333) relating to the retrieval of slaves imported on the vessel Mahmoodee. In reply, Anderson refers Kemball to Chief Secretary Malet’s letter (no.274) of 18 January 1854.
